TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataReceivedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供 和 事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要以非同步方式收集的重新導向或資料流輸出處理程序，您必須建立處理將重新導向資料流輸出事件的方法。To asynchronously collect the redirected or stream output of a process, you must create a method that handles the redirected stream output events. 寫入重新導向資料流的處理程序時，會呼叫事件處理常式方法。The event-handler method is called when the process writes to the redirected stream. 事件的委派會呼叫事件處理常式的執行個體。The event delegate calls your event handler with an instance of . 屬性包含在程序已重新導向資料流寫入文字行。The property contains the text line that the process wrote to the redirected stream. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何執行非同步的讀取的作業上的重新導向資料流`sort`命令。The following code example illustrates how to perform asynchronous read operations on the redirected stream of the `sort` command. `sort`命令是主控台應用程式讀取及排序文字輸入。The `sort` command is a console application that reads and sorts text input. 此範例會建立為事件委派`SortOutputHandler`事件處理常式並將它與相關聯事件。The example creates an event delegate for the `SortOutputHandler` event handler and associates it with the event. 此事件處理常式收到來自的重新導向的文字行資料流，格式化文字，並將文字寫入至螢幕。The event handler receives text lines from the redirected stream, formats the text, and writes the text to the screen. [!code-cpp[Process_AsyncStreams#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/CPP/sort_async.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Process_AsyncStreams#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/CS/sort_async.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Process_AsyncStreams#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/VB/sort_async.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Data As String
public: property System::String ^ Data { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得已寫入至重新導向 輸出資料流的字元行。

span.span: Gets the line of characters that was written to a redirected output stream.

value.span: 由關聯的 寫入至其重新導向的 或 資料流的字行。

span.span: The line that was written by an associated to its redirected or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您重新導向或資料流對事件處理常式中，是每次引發事件的處理程序將某行寫入至重新導向資料流。When you redirect the or stream of a to your event handler, an event is raised each time the process writes a line to the redirected stream. 屬性是該行的已寫入的重新導向的輸出資料流。The property is the line that the wrote to the redirected output stream. 可以使用事件處理常式屬性來篩選處理序的輸出，或將輸出寫入至替代位置。Your event handler can use the property to filter process output or write output to an alternate location. 例如，您可以建立將所有錯誤輸出行都儲存到指定的錯誤記錄檔的事件處理常式。For example, you might create an event handler that stores all error output lines into a designated error log file. 一條線被定義為換行字元 ("\n") 後面接著一連串字元或歸位字元後面緊跟著行摘要 ("\r\n")。A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a line feed ("\n") or a carriage return immediately followed by a line feed ("\r\n"). 行的字元是使用預設的系統 ANSI 字碼頁來編碼。The line characters are encoded using the default system ANSI code page. 屬性不會包含傳回的結束歸位字元或換行字元。The property does not include the terminating carriage return or line feed. 重新導向資料流關閉時，null 的列會傳送至事件處理常式。When the redirected stream is closed, a null line is sent to the event handler. 請確定您的事件處理常式會檢查適當之前存取它的屬性。Ensure your event handler checks the property appropriately before accessing it. 例如，您可以使用靜態方法驗證事件處理常式中的屬性。For example, you can use the static method to validate the property in your event handler. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將說明與相關聯的簡單事件處理常式事件。The following code example illustrates a simple event handler associated with the event. 此事件處理常式收到來自的重新導向的文字行資料流，格式化文字，並將文字寫入至螢幕。The event handler receives text lines from the redirected stream, formats the text, and writes the text to the screen. [!code-cpp[Process_AsyncStreams#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/CPP/datareceivedevent.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Process_AsyncStreams#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/CS/datareceivedevent.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Process_AsyncStreams#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/VB/datareceivedevent.vb#4)]
